## Summary
What should be updated or improved? (e.g. "Make install.sh more resilient when curl fails", "Add optional flag to skip confirmation.")

## Current behavior
How does it work today?

## Proposed change
What should change (behavior, options, error messages, etc.)?

## Rationale
Why is this improvement needed?

## Additional context
Links, examples, or edge cases to consider.
